page.title: 02MILITARY BASES NE. PLYMOUTH
page.content: {Crownhill Fort}was built in 1870.It was used during the Second World War.We found gun emplacements and an old dry ski-slope there. {Seaton Barracks}for the Royal Marines has an area of 200,000sq.m.The grounds are used for storing Commando Logistic Equipment and for preparing marines for the Commando Training Course. {Royal Marines}join at 16.5 yrs. and undergo training for 6 months before posting.The minimum age for N.Ireland service is 17.5 yrs. because of the terrorist enemy .Marines join for 3 yrs.(22 yrs.max.);officers join for a minimum of 5 yrs. and retire at 50. {RNEC.}Students at the Royal Naval Engineering College are studying for degrees in naval engineering.This is a top technical educational centre in South West England.
